bluetooth_adapter_missing_permissions.title: Bluetooth adapter requires additional permissions
bluetooth_adapter_missing_permissions.description:
The Bluetooth adapter **{adapter}** ({model}) is operating in degraded mode because your container needs additional permissions to fully access Bluetooth hardware.

Please follow the instructions in our documentation to add the required permissions:
[Bluetooth permissions for Docker]({docs_url})

After adding these permissions, restart your Home Assistant container for the changes to take effect.

bluetooth_adapter_passive_mode_usb.title: Bluetooth USB adapter fell back to passive scanning mode
bluetooth_adapter_passive_mode_usb.description:
The Bluetooth adapter **{adapter}** ({model}) requested active scanning mode but is operating in passive scanning mode. The device is in a bad state and needs to be power cycled.

In passive mode, the adapter can only receive advertisements but cannot request additional data from devices, which may affect device discovery and functionality.

To resolve this issue:
1. **Unplug the USB adapter and plug it back in**
2. Wait for Home Assistant to detect the adapter
3. Check system logs for any Bluetooth-related errors
4. If the issue persists, try a different USB port or consider using a different Bluetooth adapter

bluetooth_adapter_passive_mode_uart.title: Bluetooth adapter fell back to passive scanning mode
bluetooth_adapter_passive_mode_uart.description:
The Bluetooth adapter **{adapter}** ({model}) requested active scanning mode but is operating in passive scanning mode. The device is in a bad state and needs to be power cycled.

In passive mode, the adapter can only receive advertisements but cannot request additional data from devices, which may affect device discovery and functionality.

To resolve this issue:
1. **Power down the system completely** (not just a reboot)
2. Wait 10 seconds
3. Power the system back up
4. Check system logs for any Bluetooth-related errors
5. If the issue persists, the onboard Bluetooth adapter may have hardware issues
